item.title: Shop help
item.dc:creator: @fozzy fozzy
item.description:
@fozzy wrote:

It’s because the shops havn’t been added to your client. Go and open up your client.java and search for “Aubury Rune” - You’ll see a thing like this

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

The NPCID is the NPC, which is important, because if you don’t have the right one, it’ll make you log out. Below that code is all of the shops on your server. You can edit the NPCID numbers to change the shop people too. Now go and open up your Shops.cgf and make sure that the shop that’s in there is with the correct NPC.

That should do it…

Read full topic
